name: pwinty
description: This package makes working with Pwinty image-printing API in Laravel applications a breeze. You can place orders, add images and submit them for shipping. You can also subscribe to Pwinty webhooks after you configure your callback URL at the Pwinty dashboard.

name: phone-verification
description: Add phone verification workflows to your Laravel users powered by Vonage verify api.

name: apidoc
description: Use PHP 8 attributes to document your api routes.

name: laravel-observe-attribute
description: PHP 8 attribute to register Laravel model observers.

name: laravel-morph-alias-attribute
description: PHP 8 attribute to register Laravel custom polymorphic types.

name: morse
description: A command line tool to translate latin text to morse code.
